name: tachyons-border-style
description: Border style CSS module for Tachyons

scripts.start: tachyons src/tachyons-border-style.css > css/tachyons-border-style.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-style.css --minify > css/tachyons-border-style.min.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-style.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
